<samp>'''signs.png-atlas'''</samp> is a procedurally-generated [[texture atlas]] used to store textures for all [[sign]]s.

== Format ==
<samp>signs.png-atlas</samp> is a fixed-width 256Ã—256-pixel file that store textures for all signs. It includes:
* <samp>entity/signs/acacia.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/bamboo.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/birch.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/cherry.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/crimson.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/dark_oak.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/acacia.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/bamboo.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/birch.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/cherry.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/crimson.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/dark_oak.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/jungle.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/mangrove.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/oak.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/pale_oak.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/spruce.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/hanging/warped.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/jungle.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/mangrove.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/pale_oak.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/oak.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/spruce.png</samp>
* <samp>entity/signs/warped.png</samp>

== History ==
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.15|dev=Pre-release 1|Added <samp>signs.png-atlas</samp>, following the splitting of <samp>[[textures-atlas]]</samp>.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.19.3|dev=22w42a|As an optimization to resource pack loading, everything in the relevant directory is compiled into this atlas, rather than only those sprites which are used by the game.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=22w46a|A customizable atlas json file has been added which can be used to control which graphics are added to this atlas.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.19.4|dev=Pre-release 3|The way in which sprites are arranged on atlases has been changed considerably, resulting in atlas dimensions being generally smaller.
|This atlas can now be exported to the screenshots folder using F3+S.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.21.9|dev=25w31a|Mipmapped versions of this atlas are no longer generated.}}
}}

==== Mipmapped versions ====
Minecraft also generates mipmapped versions of this atlas, for unknown reasons. They are not used by the game at all - only blocks placed in the world which use the json model system use mipmapped textures.<ref>{{bug|MC-277471}}</ref> The mipmapped version no longer generates in [[1.21.9]].
